title: House air waybills (HAWB) - freight forwarder issued
dataVerified: Freight forwarder, shipper, consignee, cargo consolidation details
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake HAWB (freight forwarder fraud). Domain binding verifies freight forwarder. Consolidated cargo verification. Freight forwarder liability documentation. Letter of credit compliance.
